long_description: The Saucony Mirage 3 road-running shoes prove that mild overpronators can enjoy the benefits of minimalist shoes without sacrificing support over the miles. Lightweight nylon mesh uppers with polyurethane overlays offer high breathability; moisture-wicking nylon linings help keep your feet dry, reducing susceptibility to blisters. 4mm heel-to-toe drop encourages a shorter, lower impact stride than traditional running shoes do. EVA midsoles absorb shock, cushion feet and provide gentle support; Progrid(TM) foam in heels offers incredibly lightweight cushioning. Thermoplastic urethane arc provides stability for mild overpronators or additional support to help neutral runners battle arch fatigue on long runs. Saucony Mirage 3 road-running shoes feature blown rubber outsoles that add durable cushioning for a smooth ride.
